original_text: And a voice of a multitude being at ease was with her: and with the men of the common sort were brought Sabeans from the wilderness, which put bracelets upon their hands, and beautiful crowns upon their heads.
korean_text: 그 무리와 편히 지껄이고 즐겼으며 또 광야에서 잡류와 술 취한 사람을 청하여 오매 그들이 팔찌를 그 손목에 끼우고 아름다운 관을 그 머리에 씌웠도다

sentences.original_text: And a voice of a multitude being at ease was with her
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 편안히 쉬고 있는 무리의 소리가 그녀와 함께 있었다

sentences.original_text: and with the men of the common sort were brought Sabeans from the wilderness
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 평범한 사람들과 함께 광야에서 사바 사람들이 데려왔다

sentences.original_text: which put bracelets upon their hands
and beautiful crowns upon their heads
